        public AbstractLoggerFacade​(LoggerGroup group,
                            String name)
        Instantiates a new logger facade.

        A new logger is automatically registered with the LoggerFacadeManager.

        Parameters:
        group - the logger group
        name - the name

        public abstract void loggerFactoryUpdated​(LoggerFactory factory)
